name: LifeLeech Prototype
description:
Action RPG game in a dark fantasy world with an isometric perspective and non-classical combat gameplay with a big bet on kiting and maneuvers.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/9NCRNpE

Hints
-After spawning into the world, go to the west to encounter some enemies.
-Beware the toilet, you may fall down the rabbit hole.
